meanings.definition: A row of houses joined by common sidewalls.
meanings.sent1: The townhouses on Maple Street all look similar.
meanings.sent2: My friend lives in one of the townhouses at the end of the block.
meanings.sent3: The townhouses decided to throw a block party together.
meanings.sent4: The townhouses stood side by side like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: I can always find my way home by following the row of townhouses.

meanings.definition: A residential building containing multiple separate living units.
meanings.sent1: The townhouses in the complex have different colored doors.
meanings.sent2: There are three townhouses for sale in that building.
meanings.sent3: The townhouses were having a competition to see who could grow the tallest sunflower.
meanings.sent4: The townhouses were like a small village within the city.
meanings.sent5: I love the cozy feel of the townhouses with their little gardens.
